agents.name: The Builder
agents.author: Nexo Team
agents.description: A Full-Stack Engineer agent capable of reading code, executing terminal commands, and modifying files.

agents.name: Cloud Commander
agents.author: Nexo Team
agents.description: A DevOps Engineer agent for managing Docker containers and checking network health.

agents.name: QA Auto-Pilot
agents.author: Nexo Team
agents.description: An Automation Test Engineer agent capable of running E2E tests using Playwright.

mcp_servers.name: Arxiv
mcp_servers.description: The ArXiv MCP Server provides a bridge between AI assistants and arXiv's research repository through the Model Context Protocol (MCP). It allows AI models to search for papers and access their content in a programmatic way.

mcp_servers.name: Playwright
mcp_servers.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides browser automation capabilities using Playwright. This server enables LLMs to interact with web pages through structured accessibility snapshots, bypassing the need for screenshots or visually-tuned models.

mcp_servers.name: Chrome DevTools
mcp_servers.description: chrome-devtools-mcp lets your coding agent (such as Gemini, Claude, Cursor or Copilot) control and inspect a live Chrome browser. It acts as a Model-Context-Protocol (MCP) server, giving your AI coding assistant access to the full power of Chrome DevTools for reliable automation, in-depth debugging, and performance analysis.

mcp_servers.name: Filesystem
mcp_servers.description: Node.js server implementing Model Context Protocol (MCP) for filesystem operations.

mcp_servers.name: Context7
mcp_servers.description: Get the latest documentation and code

mcp_servers.name: Server Chart
mcp_servers.description: A visualization mcp & skills contains 25+ visual charts using @antvis. Using for chart generation and data analysis.

mcp_servers.name: Open Library
mcp_servers.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for the Internet Archive's Open Library API that enables AI assistants to search for book and author information.

prompts.name: Startup Idea Generator
prompts.description: Generates validated startup ideas based on market trends, pain points, and business models.

prompts.name: Marketing Copywriter
prompts.description: Writes high-converting marketing copy for landing pages, ads, emails, and social media.

prompts.name: Software Architect
prompts.description: Provides high-level system design, architecture diagrams, scalability, and technology decisions.

prompts.name: Researcher
prompts.description: Performs in-depth research on a specific topic, including data analysis, literature review, and methodological insights.

prompts.name: SEO Content Writer
prompts.description: Creates SEO-optimized blog posts, keyword strategies, and content outlines that rank on search engines.
